name: The Dark Wizard
description:
the dark wizard is a short Topdown RPG adventure game! battle trolls! dark elves and many more enemies! As you travel through the dark lands! 

Features: 

. single player

. 5 levels

. easy ,medium , and hard difficulty to play on!

. very nice soundtracks for each level!

. top down , RPG

Developer notes: i wanted to  try something new and different ! i never made a RPG or Topdown game before so here it is! i think the end result is great! a good looking cool game! so tell me what you think guys! As always those that support me thank you very much! much love!
